About the file size: What do you expect from a 5 hour film? Large hard disks are cheap nowadays. If you can't afford buying one,  just download the three files separately (which is possible using e.g. G3 Torrent, http://g3torrent.sourceforge.net/).
As usual, don't forget to stay on the torrent until you have uploaded at least as much as you downloaded. I'll stick around for as long as necessary, i.e. I won't upload anything else until I get substantial help seeding this film.
